resources.string: By registering, I have read and agree to TapTalk.io\'s Privacy Policy
Please read and agree to our privacy policy before continuing.

To continue the verification process, click on the ‘Open WhatsApp’ button. If you wish to use WhatsApp from another device, click on the ‘QR Code’ button to scan it on your device.\n\nPlease send the generated message to the opened chat without making any changes.

To continue the verification process, scan the QR code to open WhatsApp.\nPlease send the generated message to the opened chat without making any changes and confirm when you have sent the generated message by clicking the button below.
Enter the 6 digit OTP we’ve sent by WhatsApp to your number below.
Enter the 6 digit OTP we’ve sent by SMS to your number below.
We are checking your verification status.\nPlease wait, this may take a while.
Your number has been successfully verified
You will be redirected in %d seconds…
Your number has not been verified.
Please wait %d seconds before requesting OTP
Please wait %d seconds before requesting verification
It seems that this is your first time using TapTalk.io, please fill out the information needed below.
